vote.text: Amendment SA 2741 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 24. Record Vote Number: 56.

action.text: Amendment SA 2741 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2669-2671; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2670) Increase discretionary health funding by $2,000,000,000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2741 proposed by Senator Specter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2741 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 24. Record Vote Number: 56.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2741 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 24. Record Vote Number: 56.
